name: cloudflare-stream-key
title: Cloudflare Stream Key
description: Create a Cloudflare Stream Signing Key.

_info.content: Set a name and save, the key will be auto-generated. Notice that the API Token set in the source configuration must have the necessary permissions to do so.

name.label: Name
name.description: Optional name to identify this key.

id.label: Stream Key ID
id.description: The auto-generated Cloudflare Stream Key ID.

pem.label: Stream Signing Key
pem.description: The auto-generated Cloudflare Stream Signing Key in PEM format.
